data.title: Ultimate Wedding Songs - The Wedding Ring
data.meta_description: For some engaged couples choosing the first dance song is as simple as picking “our song”. For others, it takes research. First Dance Songs | Wedding Songs
data.meta_site_name: The Wedding Ring - The Wedding Ring
data.text:
First Dance Songs | Ultimate Wedding Songs is a guest post from Music Central Entertainment | Photo: Spirits Intrigued Photography

One of our favourite moments at any wedding is the newlywed’s first dance. Not only is this an excellent photo op, but it’s also one of the sweetest romantic moments of the entire celebration. For some couples choosing the first dance song is as simple as picking “our song”. For others, it’s researching and narrowing down options.

We asked our friend, Rob, from Music Central Entertainment to update one of our most popular lists of wedding songs: First Dance Songs.

About Music Central Entertainment

For over 30 years, London’s Music Central Entertainment (♥) (musiccentral.ca) has built a reputation for quality and a track record for putting on incredible events within the community. They have built a strong relationship with some of the best event professionals, biggest clients & best brides, and grooms in the business!

You can find Music Central Entertainment at their storefront location on Dundas Street in London, at any of The Ring’s London Wedding Expo events, their review online, or using the form below.
